thread.title: Alibaba submits offer to buy Chinese video streaming giant Youku Tudou
thread.title_full: Alibaba submits offer to buy Chinese video streaming giant Youku Tudou - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Alibaba submits offer to buy Chinese video streaming giant Youku Tudou
text: In a massive bet on Internet video, China’s Alibaba announced today it has made a $4.2 billion bid to acquire Youku Tudou. The move is not entirely shocking. Last year, Alibaba invested $1.22 billion in the company, which offers a YouTube-like service in China. That gave Alibaba and its investment partner Yunfeng Capital each an 18.5 percent […] »
